name: Under Oakbury
description:
Entry for 7DRL 2023.

Input:

Movement works through mouse (direction panel on right), through qweadzxc keys or through NumPad. 5 or Space to skip turn. S to try to enable stealth mode. T to throw an item. I to open inventory. Numpad comma, comma or F to pick up items.

Throwing requires mouse for targeting.

Races:
- human: +1 to all stats
- elf: +2 to dex, proficiency in spotting traps

Classes:
- thief: pick pocketing proficiency. At level 2, dodge.
- assassin: hits made from stealth/invisibility are critical.
